lg.head:
A CHRISTMAS GREETING
↱ From a Northern Star–Group to a Southern.
lg.l: Welcome, Brazilian brother — thy ample place is ready;

A loving hand — a smile from the north — a sunny instant
hail!

(Let the future care for itself, where it reveals its troubles,
impedimentas,

Ours, ours the present throe, the democratic aim, the accept–
anceacceptance
and the faith;)

To thee to–day, our reaching arm, our turning neck — to thee
from us the expectant eye,

Thou cluster free! thou brilliant lustrous star! thou, learning
well,
The true lesson of a nation's light in the sky,
(More shining than the Cross, more than the Crown,)
The height to be superb humanity.
